To use: (1) install.packages('r2mlm'), (2) run a model in lmer or nlme, (3) r2mlm(model_name), (4) exult (and interpret the output). https://t.co/wwNfUy4vdX

#brms version 2.14 is now on CRAN with a whole bunch of new features, most importantly an experimental implementation of within-chain parallelization. Check out all the updates here: https://t.co/eExJXABafI @mcmc_stan #rstats
